articles.author: Erik Kain
articles.title: Free PlayStation Plus April 2024 Games Revealed, Including One Fun Surprise - Forbes
articles.description: Sony has officially unveiled its April 2024 PS Plus Essential lineup.
articles.content:
Immortals of Aveum
Credit: EA
Sony has officially unveiled its April 2024 PS Plus Essential lineup. We wont learn what the April PS Plus Extra or Premium games will be for a couple more weeks.
